# OpenZFS

> Welcome to the OpenZFS Documentation. This resource provides documentation for
> users and developers working with (or contributing to) the OpenZFS
> project. New users or system administrators should refer to the
> documentation for their favorite platform to get started.

## Docs

- [OpenZFS Documentation](https://openzfs.github.io/openzfs-docs/_sources/index.rst.txt)
- [Getting Started](https://openzfs.github.io/openzfs-docs/_sources/Getting Started/index.rst.txt)
- [Alpine Linux](https://openzfs.github.io/openzfs-docs/_sources/Getting Started/Alpine Linux/index.rst.txt)
- [Alpine Linux Root on ZFS](https://openzfs.github.io/openzfs-docs/_sources/Getting Started/Alpine Linux/Root on ZFS.rst.txt)
- [Arch Linux](https://openzfs.github.io/openzfs-docs/_sources/Getting Started/Arch Linux/index.rst.txt)
- [Arch Linux Root on ZFS](https://openzfs.github.io/openzfs-docs/_sources/Getting Started/Arch Linux/Root on ZFS.rst.txt)
- [Debian](https://openzfs.github.io/openzfs-docs/_sources/Getting Started/Debian/index.rst.txt)
